scriptedEmail.name: Blog Post
scriptedEmail.description: Raises notifications to users when a blog post is made in a blog to which they are subscribed.
scriptedEmail.bodyScript:
#set($authorUrl = false) #set($authorUrl = $context_v1_email.Context.BlogPost.Author.Url) #if ($authorUrl)
$core_v2_ui.GetResizedImageHtml($context_v1_email.Context.BlogPost.Author.AvatarUrl, 32, 32, "%{ ResizeMethod='ScaleDown', ScaleFactor=2, OutputIsPersisted='True', width='32', height='32' }")
#else
$core_v2_ui.GetResizedImageHtml($context_v1_email.Context.BlogPost.Author.AvatarUrl, 32, 32, "%{ ResizeMethod='ScaleDown', ScaleFactor=2, OutputIsPersisted='True', width='32', height='32' }")
#end 		#if ($authorUrl) $context_v1_email.Context.BlogPost.Author.DisplayName #else $context_v1_email.Context.BlogPost.Author.DisplayName #end
#if ($context_v1_email.Context.BlogPost.Excerpt && $context_v1_email.Context.BlogPost.Excerpt.Length > 0)

$context_v1_email.Context.BlogPost.Excerpt $core_v2_language.GetResource('More')

#else $context_v1_email.Context.BlogPost.Body('Email') #end #set($fileUrl = $context_v1_email.Context.BlogPost.File.FileUrl) #if ($fileUrl)

#format($core_v2_language.GetResource('Body_Attachment')) #token('attachment_name_link') $context_v1_email.Context.BlogPost.File.FileName #end

#end
scriptedEmail.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="Body_Attachment">Attachment: {attachment_name_link}</resource> <resource name="Footer_ReportAbuse">{report_link}.</resource> <resource name="Footer_Unsubscribe">You received this notification because you subscribed to the blog. To unsubscribe, {unsubscribe_link}.</resource> <resource name="More">more</resource> <resource name="ReportAbuse">Flag as spam/abuse</resource> <resource name="Subject">{blog_name}: {post_title}</resource> <resource name="Unsubscribe">go here</resource> </language>
